Note: Date based on America's participation in the war.            Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Illustration shows a large chest for money marked "WAR  CHEST."  In the middle  is "60% " and spaces appear empty above  "70%, 80%, 90% and 100%." At top is a space for a name of a firm or corporation to appear.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
